channel.title: CMTs on CyberMiles News and Articles
channel.description: Recent content in CMTs on CyberMiles News and Articles

item.title: CMTs Release Notice
item.description: Dear CMT holders, According to CyberMiles whitepaper, CyberMiles Foundation is allocated with 200 million vested CMTs since the start. The CMTs owned by CyberMiles Foundation will release 10% per quarter, to be given to CyberMiles team & partners, and also 5miles. CyberMiles Foundation is standardizing the CMTs releasing process to for better transparency. Therefore, before the quarterly release, CyberMiles Foundation is making an announcement to the CMT community via its official website, Twitter, Facebook, etc.

item.title: CyberMiles基金会解锁情况说明
item.description: 各位CMT持有者，大家好！ 按照白皮书的规划，CyberMiles基金会地址0x1a14Ec3003C943a0624C7c513D50255
